title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, a portable speaker designed for those who demand the best in audio quality. With state-of-the-art design and exclusive technologies, this speaker delivers deep, clear, and immersive sound whether you're at home or on the go. The proprietary PositionIQ technology automatically detects the speaker's orientation for optimal sound quality in any environment. 

Not only is the SoundLink Flex a powerhouse of sound, but it is also built to withstand the elements. Rigorously tested to meet IP67 waterproof standards, this speaker is crafted with waterproof materials and can even float, making it perfect for outdoor adventures. Its durable design resists drops, rust, and UV light, ensuring it will last for years to come. 

The portable Bluetooth speaker is easy to hold and store, and its rechargeable battery offers up to 12 hours of playtime per charge. It also features a built-in microphone, allowing you to make and receive calls with ease. The Bose Connect app lets you customize settings, update software, and unlock additional features, while the Bluetooth connectivity allows you to connect to other devices within a 30-foot range.

Experience the power of the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker and elevate your audio experience wherever you go.

Experience the ultimate in portable audio with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Designed with state-of-the-art technology and a custom-engineered transducer, this speaker delivers deep, clear, and immersive sound wherever you go. The proprietary PositionIQ technology ensures optimal sound quality no matter how the speaker is positioned. 

Not only is the SoundLink Flex waterproof, meeting IP67 standards, but it is also crafted with durable materials that resist drops, rust, corrosion, and UV light. It even floats, making it perfect for outdoor adventures. With a rechargeable battery offering up to 12 hours of playtime, you can enjoy your music all day long.

The built-in microphone allows you to make and receive phone calls, and the Bose Connect app lets you customize settings and update the speaker's software. With a range of up to 30 feet, you can connect the SoundLink Flex to other Bluetooth devices for an even bigger sound.

Don't settle for anything less than the best. Choose the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker for an unparalleled audio experience on the go.

Customize settings, update software, and unlock additional features with the Bose Connect app. Don't miss out on the crisp audio and powerful performance of the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker.

Not only is the SoundLink Flex a powerhouse of sound, but it is also waterproof and durable. It meets IP67 waterproof standards and can even float, making it perfect for outdoor adventures. Crafted with waterproof materials, it resists water, dust, and debris, and its rugged design withstands drops and rust. It's easy to hold and store, and resistant to corrosion and UV light. 

The portable speaker features a rechargeable battery that offers up to 12 hours of playtime per charge. It charges conveniently through a USB-C cable (included). The built-in microphone allows you to make and receive calls, and a single button access your phone's voice assistant. 

Take control of your listening experience with the Bose Connect app. It automatically updates the speaker with the latest software and lets you customize settings, unlock product features, and more. 

With crisp audio free of distortions, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker ensures you hear every detail in your music. Its durable and waterproof design makes it the perfect companion for travel, outdoor activities, and pool use. Get ready to elevate your audio experience with the Bose SoundLink Flex.

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black

Description: STATE-OF-ART DESIGN: SoundLink Flex outdoor speaker is packed with exclusive technologies and a custom-engineered transducer for deep, clear, and immersive audio at home or on the go

CLEAREST POSSIBLE SOUND: Proprietary Position Qtechnology automatically detects the position of your portable Bluetooth speaker for optimal sound quality in any orientation or environment

WATERPROOF WIRELESS SPEAKER FOR TRAVEL: SoundLink Flex is rigorously tested to meet IP67 waterproof speaker standards. Crafted and sealed with waterproof materials, it even floats – ideal for outdoor adventures

PORTABLE BLUETOOTH SPEAKER: Built to resist water, dust, and debris, in a design that withstands drops and rust, this compact speaker goes wherever you do. It’s also easy to hold and store, and resistant to corrosion and UV light

RECHARGEABLE BATTERY: Portable speaker charges through USB-C cable (included). Lithium-ion battery offers up to 12 hours of life per charge

BUILT-IN MICROPHONE: You can make and receive calls through the portable Bluetooth speaker. Just one button accesses your phone's Siri or Google Assistant voice input

BOSE CONNECT APP: App automatically updates the portable Bluetooth speaker with the latest software, allows you to customize settings, unlock product features, and more

Charging time: approximately 4 hours when using the original cable.

The SoundLink Flex Bluetooth speaker does more than just immerse you – it provides a strong connection to your music. With crisp audio free of distortions, you’ll hear every instrument on the track and nuance in the vocals. It doesn’t matter how the portable speaker is positioned: PositionIQ technology detects its orientation and ensures the best sound. The portable Bluetooth speaker is packed with exclusive technologies. The transducer offers clear sound and deep bass. Its digital signal processing technologies, proprietary code, and custom algorithms work together for ideal sound quality wherever you are. Really, wherever, since the SoundLink Flex is an IP67 waterproof speaker. Its exterior can handle falls, the coat won’t peel or flake, and it resists corrosion and UV light. It’s also easy to hold or store, and you can secure the outdoor speaker with its utility loop. Rigorously tested to meet an IP67 rating, the SoundLink Flex is waterproof. It floats, too, so it won’t sink if it falls off your boat. For added protection from dust and debris, the Bluetooth speaker is crafted and sealed with waterproof materials. Plus, to ensure it can travel with you, Bose subjected the outdoor speaker to water, temperature, and drop tests. These proved that it’s durable enough for anything. And its battery offers up to 12 hours of unplugged play time. The Bose Connect app lets you customize the portable speaker settings, update software, and more. If your phone isn’t nearby, press and hold a button on the IP67 waterproof speaker to access your phone’s Siri or Google Assistant. A built-in microphone means you can also take and make phone calls through the SoundLink Flex. It also connects to other Bluetooth devices within 30 feet for even bigger sound.
